subtitle: A simple and smart way to report local issues using your voice, text, and location.
aboutText1: Talk & Fix is a citizen-friendly web platform that bridges the gap between people and local authorities.
aboutText2: Users can raise complaints through voice or text — the system automatically captures their GPS location and forwards it to concerned departments.
voiceComplaintDesc: Just speak your problem — our system converts it into text automatically.
autoLocationDesc: Your GPS coordinates are automatically captured to help identify your area.
trackStatusDesc: Know if your complaint is pending, received, or solved anytime.
smartFilterDesc: AI detects inappropriate or fake text before complaints are submitted.
speakOrType: Speak or type your issue — we’ll automatically capture your location.
invalidComplaintAlert: Please record or type a valid complaint (at least 5 characters).
locationAlert: Please fetch your location before submitting.
noIdReturned: Complaint submitted, but no ID returned.
submissionError: Error submitting complaint. Please try again later.
complaintReceived: Your complaint has been successfully received and is under review by the authorities.
noteId: Please note your Complaint ID to track your complaint status later.
trackComplaintSubtitle: Enter your Complaint ID to view details
complaintNotFound: Complaint not found. Please check your ID.
